#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main ()
{
int t;
scanf("%d",&t);
while (t--)
{
	long long n, k, m, cur, ans = 0;
	cin >> n >> k >> m;

	cur = n;

	while (1)
	{
		if ((double)cur*(double)k>(double)m)break;
		cur=cur*k;		
		ans++;
	}
cout << ans << endl;
}
return 0;
}
